sentences.sContent: Perhaps I'll buy lean meat and mince it myself.
sentences.sCn: 也许我会买来瘦肉然后自己把它铰碎。

remMethod.val: minute(adj. 微小的)； minutia(n. 细节)

words.tran: 碎肉器（等于mincing machine）；说话吞吐的人

trans.tranCn: 切碎； 装腔作势地小步走
trans.tranOther: If you mince food such as meat or vegetables, you cut or grind it up into very small pieces, usually in a machine
